Text: Theorotically this book is good, does not have any exercise regime like pilates or yoga, but do suggest of some kinda therapies which I didnt heard of (no pun intended) In my view this book theory should be incorporated with good exercise schedule than it would be perfect killer for back pain. thanks Mantesh, by the way from which country are u from?
